organic.title: Multiplayer - Super Mario Maker™ 2 for the Nintendo Switch ...
organic.snippet: Create a course with a friend, try to clear a course with up to four players on a single screen, or enjoy online multiplayer with the Super Mario Maker 2 game

organic.title: Suika Game Multi-Player Mode Expansion Pack
organic.snippet: Enjoy four game modes: "Original," "Time Limit," "Attack," and "Item." "Original" is the usual Suika Game, and the player with the highest score wins.

organic.title: Which Games Are Multiplayer?
organic.snippet: The following games feature simultaneous multiplayer gameplay (requiring two controllers). While in the Game List you can identify them by the orange 2P logo.

organic.title: How to Start a Local or Online Multiplayer Game ...
organic.snippet: Select Local Communication to play a multiplayer game wirelessly or select Mosaic Mode to play a game across multiple consoles. ... Online service · Nintendo ...
